alert.note: Alert for Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 3:56AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Harrison, Crawford, northeastern Perry, northwestern Floyd, southeastern Orange, southwestern Washington and northwestern Meade Counties through 430 AM EDT/330 AM CDT/... At 355 AM EDT/255 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of English, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... English and Carefree Town around 405 AM EDT. Corydon around 415 AM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
